review: In case anyone is wondering, you need a dependable home wifi connection, a smartphone/tablet or computer, and a tv with an available hdmi port. If you dont have access to any of these, move on.The set up is really simple, it will give you instructions on the tv once you plug it in, but heres a quick run down in case you're interested. You have to turn on your tv and chromecast, and plug the chromecast into your tvs hdmi port. Then you have to install the "chromecast app" on your phone/tablet or computer. It will request a code, which you will get via the tv. Once you do that, the chromecast will most likely install updates and restart. It might take a while, so be patient. This item includes the chromecast, a small 3 inch extension to "make your wifi connection more stable," and a usb cable to power the chromecast either through your tvs usb port or the included power adaptor.What the chromecast does is basically use your smartphone/table/computer as a remote control so that you can watch things on your tv, effectively transforming your dumbtv into a smarter one.every once in a while you get promotions simply for having this thing, so that pretty cool.
